content: 15 s<tches fdc 20 from the bo4om of the 15th double_crochet skip 9 s<tches a4ach fdc to the 25th short s<tch with a slip s<tch careful not to twist the fdc handle handles do one double_crochet in the 25th s<tch double_crochet in next 30 s<tches to marker 55 fdc 20 from the bo4om of the 55th s<tch skip 9 s<tches a4ach to the 65th last marked s<tch do 1 double_crochet in the 65th s<tch and complete round with double_crochet s remove markers ~122 s<tches round 4 double_crochet all the way around going over the fdc ~122 double_crochet round 5 place 4 markers 3 s<tches before and 3 s<tches awer each short handle double_crochet to first marker fdc 60 long then a4ach to next marker with slip_stitch double_crochet in same space as slip_stitch and then in each s<tch un<l next handles marker fdc 60 then a4ach to next marker with slip_stitch double_crochet in same space as slip_stitch and un<l end of round ~244 double_crochet round 6 double_crochet all the way around going over the fdc un<l 3 s<tches before start round marker finish row as follows to taper off the round 1 half_double_crochet 1sc 1sl cut yarn and pull through
